price: دوى لكه چې ښايي هغه شان د الله قدر ونه پېژندو، الله يقيناً زورور او برلاسى دى.
arabic: مَا قَدَرُواْ ٱللَّهَ حَقَّ قَدۡرِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَقَوِيٌّ عَزِيزٌ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: mā qadarū al-laha ḥaqqa qadrihi inna al-laha laqawiyyun ʿazīzun
